modName: re-up The Clubhouse a strip club and player home
descriptionHtml:
TO EVERYONE THAT DOWNLOADED THIS MOD PRIOR TO 10-5-12 PLEASE DOWNLOAD AGAIN. THE ORIGINAL FILE WAS NOT COMPLETE. THANKS FOR THE SUPPORT!

*Just to be clear* This does not replace skyhaven temple. It is its own building located near high hrothgar. Its after you fight the troll. it will be on your right about half way to high hrothgar.

Ever go into skyhaven temple and say \"this would be a great spot for a stripclub?\" yeah me either but I did it anyway
there are 8 dancers, 3 bouncers who wish a mother effer would try something and 6 guests all walking around doing there \"thang\". 
the club is located just before High Hrothgar (so thats why the grey beards dont come down the moutain ever). it sticks out and you cant miss it.
This mod contains no sex and I dont have any plans to include any. This is a stipclub not a brothel. Some of the idles ride a fine line but its nothing I havent seen
at a club before. I have also included a small player home in one of the rooms in the back. 

*Update* 10-19-12
added map marker
changed the entrance to the club
added VIP room
small fixes to npc
added new npc
added clothing meshes and textures from allowed mods to eliminate invisible bodies (AOM still required)
fixed issues with NAV mesh.
fixed issue with the guest named lips randomly becoming naked...(maybe I should have left that in haha)

Next update will be visual only. The update after that I will make the club more interactive. still learning papyrus. Its a long process...



Install in your data folder

I will try and help with any problems that I can but I am new at this and this entire mod was a trail and error process.

known bugs
sometimes there are idle jams and the dancers will just stand around. just wait an hour (game time of course) and it should fix itself
The dancers will continue the idle until they reach their next idle. they just float and dance and theres nothing I can do about it. looks funny when the idle requires them to lay down.
sometimes when the file loads the mannequins will have moved. just reload your save and everything should be normal again

The following files are required for this mod to work

FNIS http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/11811 by for
apachiiskyhair http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168 by apachii 
Art of magic http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/1040 by ZonZai

The following mods are not required but recommended

ashar http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14146 by sydneyB 
bright eyes http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2464 by skree000   
Ethereal Elven overhaul http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24273 by nuska
fountain of youth http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2535 by skree000  
unp blessed body unpb http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14899 by dimon99 calyps xp32

Thanks to SydneyB and Zonzai for letting me use their clothes on this mod
Thanks to Dimon for the UNP female body and for the clothes resources.
Thanks to Bethesda for creating Skyrim.
Thanks to theroll for allowing me to include his mod. as soon as he makes his mod visible i will add a link.
please PM me if you know.
Thanks again to everyone for their great work!
author: dooders
